pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for Interacting with 'PostgreSQL' / 'PostGIS' Databases // Functions to convert geometry and 'hstore' data types from 'PostgreSQL' into standard R objects, as well as to simplify the import of R data frames (including spatial data frames) into 'PostgreSQL'. Note: This package is deprecated. For new projects, we recommend using the 'sf' package to interface with geodatabases.
